<h3 id="X31835">X(31835) = CENTER OF THE ORTHOPOLAR CIRCLE OF THESE TRIANGLES: EHRMANN-MID AND 2nd EXTOUCH</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*((b+c)*a^5-(b+c)^2*a^4-2*(b^3+c^3)*a^3+(2*b^4+2*c^4+3*(b^2+c^2)*b*c)*a^2+(b^4-c^4)*(b-c)*a-(b+c)*(b^2-c^2)*(b^3-c^3))  :  :

<br>
<b>X(31835) = X(3)-5*X(3876) = 7*X(3)-3*X(11220) = 3*X(3)+X(12528) = 3*X(5)-X(24474) = 3*X(72)+X(24474) = 3*X(140)-2*X(9940) = 7*X(140)-6*X(10156) = 3*X(210)-X(5690) = 3*X(210)+X(5887) = X(355)+3*X(5692) = 3*X(392)-X(1483) = 5*X(632)-3*X(10202) = X(946)+3*X(4134) = 15*X(3876)+X(12528) = 3*X(5044)-X(9940) = 7*X(5044)-3*X(10156) = 3*X(5777)+X(31793) = 7*X(9940)-9*X(10156) = 9*X(11220)+7*X(12528) = X(31793)-3*X(31837)</b>
<p>X(31835) lies on these lines:
{2,24475}, {3,3219}, {4,26792}, {5,72}, {8,6929}, {10,5694}, {30,5777}, {63,6924}, {65,10592}, {78,6914}, {119,21677}, {140,912}, {144,6885}, {210,5690}, {329,6917}, {355,5692}, {392,1483}, {517,546}, {518,5901}, {548,971}, {632,10202}, {758,9956}, {916,13630}, {936,24467}, {942,3628}, {946,4134}, {952,960}, {1125,8254}, {1216,29958}, {1385,5302}, {1482,3681}, {1656,3868}, {1807,3074}, {2077,3652}, {2771,6684}, {2800,4015}, {2801,13624}, {3530,13369}, {3555,10283}, {3560,3940}, {3579,31803}, {3617,6982}, {3625,10284}, {3627,5927}, {3634,5885}, {3786,15952}, {3817,4537}, {3850,10157}, {3869,5790}, {3874,11230}, {3877,12645}, {3927,5780}, {3988,9955}, {4002,10273}, {4005,22791}, {4067,10175}, {4084,31399}, {4420,11849}, {4533,12672}, {4661,10595}, {5066,5806}, {5178,10738}, {5220,11249}, {5258,6265}, {5267,22935}, {5428,12691}, {5693,26446}, {5720,26921}, {5844,13600}, {5884,11231}, {5886,5904}, {6901,17484}, {6928,31018}, {6930,20007}, {6971,27131}, {6976,20013}, {7508,31445}, {9021,24206}, {9856,28212}, {10167,15712}, {10902,12738}, {11227,12108}, {11374,18397}, {14893,31822}, {15064,18480}, {15699,24473}, {16208,17857}, {18253,31659}, {28224,31786}, {31730,31828}, {31797,31821}</p>
<p>
X(31835) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {5, 72}, {10, 5694}, {1216, 29958}, {3579, 31803}, {3625, 10284}, {3678, 20117}, {5690, 5887}, {5777, 31837}, {18480, 31806}, {31730, 31828}<br>
X(31835) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (140, 5044), (942, 3628), (5885, 3634), (13369, 3530)<br>
X(31835) = complement of X(24475)<br>
X(31835) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (210, 5887, 5690), (3927, 5780, 6911)<br>
</p>
